meanings.definition: A piece of paper money issued by a bank.
meanings.sent1: I used banknotes to buy a new toy.
meanings.sent2: The cashier counted the banknotes carefully.
meanings.sent3: The banknotes in my wallet made me feel rich.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a stack of colorful banknotes.
meanings.sent5: The wind scattered the banknotes like confetti.

meanings.definition: A promissory note issued by a bank, payable to the bearer on demand.
meanings.sent1: Grandpa gave me banknotes for my birthday.
meanings.sent2: The banknotes were exchanged for gold at the market.
meanings.sent3: I pretended the banknotes were magic spells.
meanings.sent4: His words were as valuable as banknotes in a crisis.
meanings.sent5: The banknotes rustled softly in the breeze.
